meanings.definition: A soft murmuring or rustling sound.
meanings.sent1: The susurruses of the leaves in the wind were soothing.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the susurruses of the stream as I walked by.
meanings.sent3: The susurruses of the audience's whispers filled the theater.
meanings.sent4: The susurruses of the city at night lulled me to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The susurruses of the rain on the roof created a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: To make a soft murmuring or rustling sound.
meanings.sent1: The wind susurruses through the trees on a calm day.
meanings.sent2: She susurruses a lullaby to her baby to help them sleep.
meanings.sent3: The cat susurruses as it rubs against my leg, seeking attention.
meanings.sent4: The river susurruses as it flows gently over the rocks.
meanings.sent5: The leaves susurruses in the breeze, creating a relaxing ambiance.
